troparion: (Tone 6) O Lord, most high, who dwell in the heavens,* creator of every living thing,* save us, O our God,* for our hope is in You, our Savior.
prokimenon: to my God I made my appeal
I will praise You, Lord. You have rescued me and have not let my enemies rejoice over me.
second_prokimenon: In You, O Lord, * I take refuge.
Let me never be put to shame.
In Your justice, set me free; hear me and speedily rescue.
